item.title: By: Helen
item.dc:creator: Helen
item.description: I tried Firefox and flunked it. If I'm going to give up Safari, I want to be able to control my browser entirely with the keyboard, just as Safari makes possible. I looked at both Firefox and Netscape and, in spite of Safari's bugs, I'll stick with it. Worse yet with FF, there's no way of importing Safari's bookmarks.
item.content:encoded: I tried Firefox and flunked it. If I’m going to give up Safari, I want to be able to control my browser entirely with the keyboard, just as Safari makes possible. I looked at both Firefox and Netscape and, in spite of Safari’s bugs, I’ll stick with it. Worse yet with FF, there’s no way of importing Safari’s bookmarks.
